page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: In the playground children play football, rugby, skipping, ball games, chasing, hide and seek, tig and hopscotch as well as games based on popular television programmes such as A. Team, Emu's World. There seems to be more variety of games played by girls than boys and many include rhymes. This is a skipping rhyme:-Madamoiselle went to the well To wash her face, to dry it, To comb her hair, to say a prayer, To catch a ball in the basket. This rhyme is said while jumping with feet together and apart, and then legs crossed:- Cat's got the measles, Dog's got the flu, Chicken's got the chicken pox, And so have you.
